column4: how do I change the color of the desktop "panels" on the bottom taskbar? they default to an ugly tan/brown color and changing themes doesn't help?
right click the panel then select properties then the background tab
I do that but still don't see it!
then select solid colour
I'm talking about the desktop ICONS in the bottom right corner
for that you need a theme that does that for you

I installed a dark theme that did , so you need to find one that does that...
ok
thanks for trying to help

that seems faster than me
that's through a netgear router
